page.title: 17A WORKING DAY
page.content: I woke at seven o'clock,had breakfast, got washed and dressed.I helped with the dishes,fed the cat and practised my clarinet before going to school.At school I read my book,went to assembly and did English work before the swimming lesson.At the baths I swam 400 metres and trod water for three minutes.After a lunch of sandwiches,apple and fruit cake I played with my friends. I wrote a story in the afternoon, watched a television programme and after school I went to gymnastics club. For tea I had lamb chops,vegetables and cake.I went to the youth club.At nine o'clock I had a bath,brushed my hair and teeth and read my book before going to sleep.
